p: your good letters are wonderful to receive - We can hardly wait for Tuesday, when we will start up to you. We will bring comforters Enid dear, so dont worry about having enough to keep our cold bones "comfy"!
It has been extremely cold here and our flowers, at last, are frozen hard.
We tried to Keep them for whoever might come down - but now they are gone.
It will be so good to see you all.
